# Arquitectura del Sistema - Prompt Maestro Electricidad

Este documento describe la arquitectura técnica, patrones de diseño y decisiones arquitectónicas de la aplicación.

## 🏗️ Visión General de la Arquitectura

### Arquitectura de Alto Nivel

```
┌─────────────────┐    ┌─────────────────┐    ┌─────────────────┐
│   Frontend      │    │   Backend       │    │   Servicios     │
│   (Next.js)     │◄──►│   (API Routes)  │◄──►│   Externos      │
│                 │    │                 │    │                 │
│ • React 18      │    │ • Next.js API   │    │ • PostgreSQL    │
│ • TypeScript    │    │ • Prisma ORM    │    │ • Redis Cache   │
│ • Tailwind CSS  │    │ • NextAuth.js   │    │ • Vercel        │
│ • Framer Motion │    │ • Zod Validation│    │ • Sentry        │
│ • PWA           │    │ • Rate Limiting │    │ • Analytics     │
└─────────────────┘    └─────────────────┘    └─────────────────┘
```

### Flujo de Datos

```
Usuario ──► PWA ──► Service Worker ──► Cache/Network ──► API ──► Database
   ▲                     │                                │
   │                     ▼                                ▼
   └─── UI Updates ◄── State Management ◄─── Data Layer ◄──┘
```

## 🎯 Principios Arquitectónicos

### 1. Performance First
- **SSR/SSG Híbrido**: Páginas estáticas para contenido educativo, SSR para datos dinámicos
- **Code Splitting**: Carga bajo demanda de componentes y rutas
- **Lazy Loading**: Imágenes y componentes pesados se cargan cuando son necesarios
- **Cache Strategies**: Múltiples niveles de cache para optimizar velocidad

### 2. Offline First
- **Service Worker**: Cache inteligente para funcionalidad offline
- **Local Storage**: Progreso del usuario guardado localmente
- **Sync Background**: Sincronización automática cuando hay conexión
- **Fallbacks**: Páginas y funcionalidades offline

### 3. Mobile First
- **Responsive Design**: Diseño que se adapta a cualquier pantalla
- **Touch Optimized**: Interacciones optimizadas para dispositivos táctiles
- **PWA Native**: Experiencia similar a app nativa
- **Performance Mobile**: Optimizado para conexiones lentas

### 4. Accessibility First
- **WCAG 2.1 AA**: Cumplimiento de estándares de accesibilidad
- **Semantic HTML**: Estructura semántica correcta
- **Keyboard Navigation**: Navegación completa por teclado
- **Screen Reader**: Compatible con lectores de pantalla

## 🏛️ Arquitectura Frontend

### Estructura de Componentes

```
src/components/
├── ui/                     # Componentes base reutilizables
│   ├── button.tsx         # Botón con variantes
│   ├── card.tsx           # Tarjetas con efectos
│   ├── input.tsx          # Inputs con validación
│   └── modal.tsx          # Modales accesibles
├── layout/                # Componentes de layout
│   ├── header.tsx         # Navegación principal
│   ├── footer.tsx         # Pie de página
│   └── sidebar.tsx        # Barra lateral
├── educational/           # Componentes educativos
│   ├── level-card.tsx     # Tarjeta de nivel
│   ├── progress-bar.tsx   # Barra de progreso
│   ├── quiz-component.tsx # Sistema de quiz
│   └── theory-viewer.tsx  # Visor de teoría
└── interactive/           # Componentes interactivos
    ├── circuit-simulator.tsx  # Simulador de circuitos
    ├── calculator.tsx         # Calculadoras
    └── formula-renderer.tsx   # Renderizador de fórmulas
```

### Patrón de Composición

```typescript
// Ejemplo de composición de componentes
interface LevelCardProps {
  level: Level;
  isCompleted: boolean;
  onClick: () => void;
}

export function LevelCard({ level, isCompleted, onClick }: LevelCardProps) {
  return (
    <Card variant={level.difficulty} hover="lift">
      <CardHeader>
        <LevelBadge difficulty={level.difficulty} />
        <CardTitle>{level.title}</CardTitle>
        <CardDescription>{level.description}</CardDescription>
      </CardHeader>
      <CardContent>
        <ProgressIndicator 
          current={level.progress} 
          total={100} 
          showXP={level.xpReward}
        />
        <ActionButton 
          variant={isCompleted ? "completed" : "primary"}
          onClick={onClick}
        >
          {isCompleted ? "Revisar" : "Comenzar"}
        </ActionButton>
      </CardContent>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

### Estado Global (Zustand)

```typescript
// store/index.ts
interface AppState {
  // Usuario y autenticación
  user: User | null;
  isAuthenticated: boolean;
  
  // Progreso educativo
  currentLevel: Level | null;
  completedLevels: number[];
  userStats: UserStats;
  
  // UI y configuración
  theme: 'light' | 'dark' | 'system';
  notifications: Notification[];
  isOffline: boolean;
  
  // Acciones
  setUser: (user: User) => void;
  completeLevel: (levelId: number, score: number) => void;
  addNotification: (notification: Notification) => void;
  toggleTheme: () => void;
}

const useAppStore = create<AppState>()(
  devtools(
    persist(
      immer((set, get) => ({
        // Estado inicial
        user: null,
        isAuthenticated: false,
        currentLevel: null,
        completedLevels: [],
        
        // Acciones con Immer para inmutabilidad
        completeLevel: (levelId, score) => set((state) => {
          if (!state.completedLevels.includes(levelId)) {
            state.completedLevels.push(levelId);
            state.userStats.totalXP += score;
            state.userStats.completedLevels += 1;
          }
        }),
      })),
      {
        name: 'prompt-maestro-electricidad-store',
        partialize: (state) => ({
          user: state.user,
          completedLevels: state.completedLevels,
          theme: state.theme,
        }),
      }
    )
  )
);
```

## 🔧 Arquitectura Backend

### API Routes Structure

```
src/app/api/
├── auth/                  # Autenticación
│   ├── [...nextauth]/     # NextAuth.js endpoints
│   └── register/          # Registro de usuarios
├── levels/                # Gestión de niveles
│   ├── route.ts          # GET /api/levels
│   ├── [id]/             # GET /api/levels/[id]
│   └── progress/         # POST /api/levels/progress
├── user/                  # Gestión de usuarios
│   ├── profile/          # GET/PUT /api/user/profile
│   ├── stats/            # GET /api/user/stats
│   └── achievements/     # GET /api/user/achievements
├── quiz/                  # Sistema de evaluación
│   ├── [levelId]/        # GET /api/quiz/[levelId]
│   └── submit/           # POST /api/quiz/submit
└── admin/                 # Panel administrativo
    ├── users/            # Gestión de usuarios
    ├── content/          # Gestión de contenido
    └── analytics/        # Métricas y analytics
```

### Middleware Stack

```typescript
// middleware.ts
import { withAuth } from "next-auth/middleware";
import { ratelimit } from "@/lib/ratelimit";

export default withAuth(
  async function middleware(req) {
    // Rate limiting
    const ip = req.ip ?? '127.0.0.1';
    const { success } = await ratelimit.limit(ip);
    
    if (!success) {
      return new Response('Too Many Requests', { status: 429 });
    }
    
    // CORS headers
    const response = NextResponse.next();
    response.headers.set('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*');
    response.headers.set('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE');
    
    return response;
  },
  {
    callbacks: {
      authorized: ({ token, req }) => {
        // Rutas protegidas
        if (req.nextUrl.pathname.startsWith('/admin')) {
          return token?.role === 'admin';
        }
        if (req.nextUrl.pathname.startsWith('/dashboard')) {
          return !!token;
        }
        return true;
      },
    },
  }
);
```

### Validación con Zod

```typescript
// lib/validations.ts
import { z } from 'zod';

export const LevelProgressSchema = z.object({
  levelId: z.number().min(0).max(99),
  score: z.number().min(0).max(100),
  timeSpent: z.number().min(0),
  completedSections: z.array(z.string()),
});

export const UserRegistrationSchema = z.object({
  email: z.string().email(),
  password: z.string().min(8).max(100),
  name: z.string().min(2).max(50),
  acceptTerms: z.boolean().refine(val => val === true),
});

// Uso en API route
export async function POST(request: Request) {
  try {
    const body = await request.json();
    const validatedData = LevelProgressSchema.parse(body);
    
    // Procesar datos validados
    const result = await updateUserProgress(validatedData);
    
    return NextResponse.json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    if (error instanceof z.ZodError) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'Datos inválidos', details: error.errors },
        { status: 400 }
      );
    }
    throw error;
  }
}
```

## 💾 Arquitectura de Datos

### Modelo de Base de Datos

```prisma
// prisma/schema.prisma
model User {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  email         String    @unique
  name          String?
  image         String?
  role          Role      @default(USER)
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt
  
  // Relaciones
  progress      UserProgress[]
  achievements  UserAchievement[]
  quizAttempts  QuizAttempt[]
  
  @@map("users")
}

model Level {
  id            Int       @id
  title         String
  description   String
  difficulty    Difficulty
  category      Category
  xpReward      Int
  estimatedTime Int
  content       Json      // Contenido estructurado
  isPublished   Boolean   @default(false)
  
  // Relaciones
  progress      UserProgress[]
  quizzes       Quiz[]
  
  @@map("levels")
}

model UserProgress {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  userId        String
  levelId       Int
  score         Int?
  timeSpent     Int       @default(0)
  completedAt   DateTime?
  lastAccessed  DateTime  @default(now())
  
  // Relaciones
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id])
  level         Level     @relation(fields: [levelId], references: [id])
  
  @@unique([userId, levelId])
  @@map("user_progress")
}

model Quiz {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  levelId       Int
  questions     Json      // Array de preguntas
  passingScore  Int       @default(70)
  timeLimit     Int?      // En segundos
  
  // Relaciones
  level         Level     @relation(fields: [levelId], references: [id])
  attempts      QuizAttempt[]
  
  @@map("quizzes")
}
```

### Cache Strategy

```typescript
// lib/cache.ts
import { Redis } from '@upstash/redis';

const redis = Redis.fromEnv();

export class CacheManager {
  // Cache de niveles (TTL: 1 hora)
  static async getLevels(): Promise<Level[]> {
    const cached = await redis.get('levels:all');
    if (cached) return cached as Level[];
    
    const levels = await prisma.level.findMany({
      where: { isPublished: true },
      orderBy: { id: 'asc' }
    });
    
    await redis.setex('levels:all', 3600, levels);
    return levels;
  }
  
  // Cache de progreso de usuario (TTL: 5 minutos)
  static async getUserProgress(userId: string): Promise<UserProgress[]> {
    const cacheKey = `user:${userId}:progress`;
    const cached = await redis.get(cacheKey);
    if (cached) return cached as UserProgress[];
    
    const progress = await prisma.userProgress.findMany({
      where: { userId },
      include: { level: true }
    });
    
    await redis.setex(cacheKey, 300, progress);
    return progress;
  }
  
  // Invalidar cache
  static async invalidateUserCache(userId: string): Promise<void> {
    await redis.del(`user:${userId}:progress`);
    await redis.del(`user:${userId}:stats`);
  }
}
```

## 🔄 PWA Architecture

### Service Worker Strategy

```javascript
// public/sw.js - Estrategias de cache
const CACHE_STRATEGIES = {
  // Cache First: Recursos estáticos
  STATIC: {
    cacheName: 'static-v1',
    strategy: 'CacheFirst',
    patterns: [/\.(css|js|woff2|png|jpg|svg)$/],
    maxAge: 30 * 24 * 60 * 60, // 30 días
  },
  
  // Network First: API y contenido dinámico
  DYNAMIC: {
    cacheName: 'dynamic-v1',
    strategy: 'NetworkFirst',
    patterns: [/\/api\//, /\/niveles\/\d+/],
    maxAge: 5 * 60, // 5 minutos
  },
  
  // Stale While Revalidate: Páginas principales
  PAGES: {
    cacheName: 'pages-v1',
    strategy: 'StaleWhileRevalidate',
    patterns: [/\/(niveles|simulaciones|calculadoras)/],
    maxAge: 24 * 60 * 60, // 24 horas
  }
};

// Implementación de estrategias
self.addEventListener('fetch', (event) => {
  const { request } = event;
  const url = new URL(request.url);
  
  // Determinar estrategia basada en la URL
  const strategy = determineStrategy(url);
  
  if (strategy) {
    event.respondWith(handleRequest(request, strategy));
  }
});
```

### Offline Data Sync

```typescript
// lib/offline-sync.ts
export class OfflineSync {
  private static queue: OfflineAction[] = [];
  
  // Añadir acción a la cola offline
  static addToQueue(action: OfflineAction): void {
    this.queue.push(action);
    localStorage.setItem('offline-queue', JSON.stringify(this.queue));
  }
  
  // Sincronizar cuando hay conexión
  static async syncWhenOnline(): Promise<void> {
    if (!navigator.onLine) return;
    
    const queue = this.getQueue();
    const results = await Promise.allSettled(
      queue.map(action => this.executeAction(action))
    );
    
    // Remover acciones exitosas
    const failedActions = queue.filter((_, index) => 
      results[index].status === 'rejected'
    );
    
    this.queue = failedActions;
    localStorage.setItem('offline-queue', JSON.stringify(this.queue));
  }
  
  private static async executeAction(action: OfflineAction): Promise<void> {
    switch (action.type) {
      case 'COMPLETE_LEVEL':
        await fetch('/api/levels/progress', {
          method: 'POST',
          body: JSON.stringify(action.payload),
        });
        break;
      case 'UPDATE_PROFILE':
        await fetch('/api/user/profile', {
          method: 'PUT',
          body: JSON.stringify(action.payload),
        });
        break;
    }
  }
}
```

## 🎨 Design System Architecture

### Token System

```typescript
// lib/design-tokens.ts
export const designTokens = {
  colors: {
    electric: {
      50: '#f0f9ff',
      500: '#0ea5e9',
      900: '#0c4a6e',
    },
    voltage: {
      50: '#fefce8',
      500: '#eab308',
      900: '#713f12',
    },
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: '0.25rem',
    sm: '0.5rem',
    md: '1rem',
    lg: '1.5rem',
    xl: '2rem',
  },
  typography: {
    fontFamily: {
      sans: ['Inter', 'system-ui', 'sans-serif'],
      mono: ['JetBrains Mono', 'monospace'],
    },
    fontSize: {
      xs: ['0.75rem', { lineHeight: '1rem' }],
      sm: ['0.875rem', { lineHeight: '1.25rem' }],
      base: ['1rem', { lineHeight: '1.5rem' }],
    },
  },
} as const;
```

### Component Variants

```typescript
// components/ui/button.tsx
import { cva, type VariantProps } from 'class-variance-authority';

const buttonVariants = cva(
  // Base styles
  'inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50',
  {
    variants: {
      variant: {
        default: 'bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90',
        electric: 'bg-electric-500 text-white hover:bg-electric-600',
        voltage: 'bg-voltage-500 text-white hover:bg-voltage-600',
        current: 'bg-current-500 text-white hover:bg-current-600',
        resistance: 'bg-resistance-500 text-white hover:bg-resistance-600',
      },
      size: {
        sm: 'h-9 px-3 text-sm',
        md: 'h-10 px-4 py-2',
        lg: 'h-11 px-8',
        xl: 'h-12 px-10 text-lg',
      },
    },
    defaultVariants: {
      variant: 'default',
      size: 'md',
    },
  }
);

export interface ButtonProps
  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {}

export const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
  ({ className, variant, size, ...props }, ref) => {
    return (
      <button
        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
        ref={ref}
        {...props}
      />
    );
  }
);
```

## 📊 Performance Architecture

### Bundle Optimization

```javascript
// next.config.js
const withBundleAnalyzer = require('@next/bundle-analyzer')({
  enabled: process.env.ANALYZE === 'true',
});

module.exports = withBundleAnalyzer({
  experimental: {
    optimizePackageImports: [
      'lucide-react',
      'framer-motion',
      '@radix-ui/react-dialog',
    ],
  },
  
  // Webpack optimizations
  webpack: (config, { isServer }) => {
    if (!isServer) {
      config.resolve.fallback = {
        ...config.resolve.fallback,
        fs: false,
      };
    }
    
    // Split chunks optimization
    config.optimization.splitChunks = {
      chunks: 'all',
      cacheGroups: {
        vendor: {
          test: /[\\/]node_modules[\\/]/,
          name: 'vendors',
          chunks: 'all',
        },
        common: {
          name: 'common',
          minChunks: 2,
          chunks: 'all',
          enforce: true,
        },
      },
    };
    
    return config;
  },
});
```

### Image Optimization

```typescript
// components/optimized-image.tsx
import Image from 'next/image';
import { useState } from 'react';

interface OptimizedImageProps {
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  width: number;
  height: number;
  priority?: boolean;
  className?: string;
}

export function OptimizedImage({
  src,
  alt,
  width,
  height,
  priority = false,
  className,
}: OptimizedImageProps) {
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
  
  return (
    <div className={cn('overflow-hidden', className)}>
      <Image
        src={src}
        alt={alt}
        width={width}
        height={height}
        priority={priority}
        quality={85}
        placeholder="blur"
        blurDataURL="data:image/jpeg;base64,
